spec_data.Name: rubygem-shoulda-matchers
spec_data.Description:
shoulda-matchers provides Test::Unit- and RSpec-compatible one-liners that
test common Rails functionality. These tests would otherwise be much longer,
more complex, and error-prone.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 26 Feb 2017 05:31:47 PM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Making tests easy on the fingers and eyes
